item.description:
This episode is bought to you by our friends at Betovo!


Welcome back to another episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Today, The Podfather welcomes, Former Exclusive Watch Dealer; Paul Thorpe is in the house.


From spending forty years in the watch game, encompassing all the usual affair; Robberies, celebrity clientele & working with Michael Jackson. To Advising Mohamed Al-Fayed, what happened to Diana and attempts to unite the country.


Sit back and enjoy the show. We'll see you on the other side.

item.title: Terry Turbo: THE KING OF CLUBS! (One Nation, 90's Rave Scene Documentary)
item.itunes:title: Terry Turbo: THE KING OF CLUBS! (One Nation, 90's Rave Scene Documentary)
item.itunes:subtitle: Terry Turbo: THE KING OF CLUBS! (One Nation, 90's Rave Scene Documentary)
item.description:
So excited to share something extra special with all of our Criminal Connection Podcast family, introducing, The King of Clubs series!


Terry Turbo gave ten million clubbers a good time, every time. From humble beginnings working in a McDonalds fast food restaurant to handing out flyers and selling rave tickets within the UK rave scene, he built up the country's biggest dance music empire, starting and running One Nation, Dreamscape, Rave Nation and Garage Nation - for a decade, he played host to more than 25,000 clubbers every week, all over the World. 'King of Clubs...This is Terry's no-holds barred tale of the mad rave scene that became part of his everyday life.


He has mixed with dozens of celebrities and gangsters - the story is littered with names as diverse as Tom Jones, Alesha Dixon, Kano, Robert Lindsay, Howard Marks, Julian Clary, Tamara Beckwith, Puff Daddy, The So Solid Crew, Dizzy Rascal, Shane Ritchie, Estelle, Miss Dynamite and various legendary faces from the Underworld and the Italian Mafia - he has been involved in life threatening situations fought off gunmen and lived a life of champagne hedonism that few can dream of.


Big thank you to our partners at Betovo!


Shout out to the King of Club sponsors:

Simian Saboteur - https://simiansaboteur.com/ - Use the code EXPLOSIVE10 for 10% off your first order


Tune in every Wednesday at 7pm for weekly releases of The King of Clubs here on the Criminal Connection Podcast channel!


Sit back, enjoy the first few chapters and let us know your thoughts in the comments. We will see you next Wednesday for the next chapter in this epic tale.


King of Clubs on Kindle: https://www.amazon.co.uk/King-Clubs-Drugs-Thugs-Nation-ebook/dp/B07DHFMVLP


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

item.description:
Welcome back to another episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Today, The Podfather welcomes Lurata Lyon, a victim of Kidnapping & Human Trafficking.


Lurata, at a young age, was kidnapped by human traffickers & organ harvestors & has been through the worst trauma that any human being could go through.


She bravely escaped, lived & survived to tell her tale and against all the odds she has become a notable public speaker an advocate for human rights & an author.

item.itunes:subtitle: Stuart Reid - Crime Lord, 10 Years of CAT A, Drug Trafficking & Prison Escapes
item.description:
Welcome back to another episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Today, The Podfather welcomes a podcast exclusive, Stuart Reid.


A man who has spent 20 years behind bars, 10 of which was being a CAT A prisoner, a man who was described by the National Crime Agency as, 'one of the most serious criminals in England', and described by himself as being, 'from my toes to my head, [I'm] crooked'. Hear about his rise from rave promoter to drug trafficker in his childhood vocation of, 'not being skint'.


Hear it all here, exclusively on the Criminal Connection Podcast.


Now sit back and enjoy the show.

item.itunes:title: Episode 35: Andy Swallow - Inter city firm, Pirate Radio owner & Illegal Rave Promoter
item.itunes:subtitle: Andy Swallow - Inter city firm, Pirate Radio owner & Illegal Rave Promoter
item.description:
Welcome back to another episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Today, The Podfather welcomes Andy Swallow, one of the most important street culture influencers that you've never heard of.


Hear all about Andy's life, from being founding part of West Ham United's Hooligan Firm, The Inter City Firm, to his days running Centreforce Radio, a pirate radio station that was instrumental during the Second Summer of Love period of acid house and rave music culture in the UK.


Now sit back and enjoy the show.

item.title: Episode 11: Shaun Attwood - Former Drug Kingpin
item.itunes:title: Episode 11: Shaun Attwood - Former Drug Kingpin
item.itunes:subtitle: Shaun Attwood - Former Drug Kingpin
item.description:
Welcome back to the Criminal Connection Podcast!


Today the Podfather, Terry Stone, welcomes Former Drug Kingpin & fellow podcaster, Shaun Attwood.


From growing up in Widnes to being a drug kingpin in America, does he have some stories to tell.


Starting from being a stockbroker in a 'Wolf of Wall Street' like office, to being a drug kingpin on the west coast of America, to then being sentenced to nine and a half years in jail.


Hear about all of his exploits with 'Wildman', his association with cartels, and his stories from his regular working life which rival those that happened when he was a criminal.


Now sit back, strap in and enjoy the show.


Big thank you to our sponsors:

item.title: Episode 10: John Cooper - Kings Counsel (Essex Boys, Manchester Arena Bombing & more)
item.itunes:title: Episode 10: John Cooper - Kings Counsel (Essex Boys, Manchester Arena Bombing & more)
item.itunes:subtitle: John Cooper - Kings Counsel
item.description:
Welcome back to the Criminal Connection Podcast!


Today the Podfather, Terry Stone, welcomes British barrister, Professor John Cooper KC.


John is recognised as one of the most effective cross-examiners at the Bar, Working on cases that involve serious crime including murder, serious violence, drug trafficking, terrorism, fraud, appellate work, human rights, public protest and media.


He represented the majority of bereaved families at the Manchester Arena inquiry and assisted in the case involving with the Leah Betts death at Raquels as well as representing Micky Steele in the famous Essex Boys triple murder.


His reputation for being fearless is well merited.


Hear all of his high profile stories involving drug, gangs and terrorism on this episode of the Criminal Connection Podcast!


Now sit back and enjoy the show.


Big thank you to our sponsors:

Sure Pure: https://surepure.co.uk/

Stargaze Entertainments: https://www.stargazeentertainment.co.uk/

Dream Mentoring: https://dreammentoring.co.uk/

Carson Kaye: https://www.carsonkaye.co.uk/


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

item.itunes:subtitle: Charlotte Kirk - The Reckoning & Oceans 8
item.description:
Welcome back to the Criminal Connection Podcast!


Today the Podfather, Terry Stone, welcomes actor Charlotte Kirk.


On the podcast today, Charlotte talk all things Hollywood. The good and the bad. From staring in the star studded female led 'Oceans 8', winning multiple awards for her role in 'The Reckoning', and never meeting your idols unless it's Al Pacino, to the dark side of the film industry and Hollywood's dark underbelly.


We hear all about her upcoming move 'Duchess' and of course, her favourite gangster movies. What more could you want.


Hear it all on this episode The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Now sit back and enjoy the show.

item.title: Episode 7: Clive Driscoll - Former Met DCI (Solved Stephen Lawrence case)
item.itunes:title: Episode 7: Clive Driscoll - Former Met DCI (Solved Stephen Lawrence case)
item.itunes:subtitle: Clive Driscoll - Former Met DCI (Stephen Lawrence)
item.description:
Welcome back to the Criminal Connection Podcast!


Today the Podfather, Terry Stone, welcomes a law enforcement legend, Former Detective Chief Inspector Clive Driscoll.


He solved the Stephen Lawrence murders and bought the remaining killers to justice, he has written a book about his career that was turned into a TV series and has so many great stories to share with you all about his highly decorated career in bringing high level criminals to justice.


Hear it all on this episode The Criminal Connection Podcast.


Now sit back and enjoy the show.

item.description:

Lee has been on the doors for 40 years and Tony Tucker was his right hand man in the 1990s. Hes knocked out Roy Pretty Boy Shaw, had a run in with Lenny McLean & throughout his career, he has been shot, stabbed, slashed & petrol bombed.


Hear it all on this episode The Criminal Connection Podcast.

item.title: Episode 5: Noel Clarke - BAFTA Award winning actor, producer, screenwriter and director (Kidulthood, Doctor Who, Bulletproof)
item.itunes:title: Episode 5: Noel Clarke - BAFTA Award winning actor, producer, screenwriter and director (Kidulthood, Doctor Who, Bulletproof)
item.itunes:subtitle: Noel Clarke - BAFTA Award winning actor, producer, screenwriter and director (Kidulthood, Doctor Who, Bulletproof)
item.description:
Welcome back to another episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast with your host, The Podfather, Terry Stone!This week we are joined by Bafta winning legend, the one and only, Noel Clarke.


Noel shares never heard before stories about growing up in London, how his acting career started along with the true story behind the iconic movies Kidulthood, Adulthood and Brotherhood.


Noel gives his honest take on recent allegations and tells all about his history with Adam Deacon.


It was amazing to have Noel on the show to tell his story and we hope you all enjoy the podcast as much as we did recording it.


Now sit back and enjoy the show, are you dizzy blud?

item.itunes:title: Episode 4: Emily Wyatt - Tony Tucker and Charlotte! (Rise of the Footsoldier)
item.itunes:subtitle: Tony Tucker and Charlotte! (Rise of the Footsoldier)
item.description:
This week we are very lucky to be joined by one of the leading ladies from the #RiseOfTheFootsoldier franchise, the one and only Emily Wyatt, also known as Charlotte!


Emily reveals how she got the role in the Footsoldier franchise, shares never heard before behind the scenes stories, looks back on all of her other wonderful roles and shares a sneaky peek into what the future holds!


The Podfather and Emily talk about movies, memories, premieres, parenthood and much, much more in this hilarious episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast. Dont forget to like, subscribe and leave a comment letting us know what you thought of the show and who else you would like to see in the future, we read every comment!

item.title: Episode 3: Vas Blackwood (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels)
item.itunes:title: Episode 3: Vas Blackwood (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels)
item.itunes:subtitle: Vas Blackwood (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels)
item.description:
Welcome back to The Criminal Connection Podcast with your host, The Podfather, Terry Stone!


This week we are joined by a film and television legend, the one and only, Vas Blackwood! Vas takes us all the way back to his first days in the world of acting, sharing some hilarious and never before heard stories from hanging out with Dustin Hoffman to being impersonated by Brad Pitt! Vas tells all about #LockStockAndTwoSmokingBarrels from how he got the gig to how he got the wig!


Vas and Terry share stories from their time working together on classic movies such as Rolling With The Nines, including that time they had to allocate undercover armed police seats at the premiere!


Tune in to hear Vas talk about his role in the upcoming movie #AnuvaHood where he stars alongside Ed Sheeran along with much, much more.


It was a pleasure to have Vas in the studio and let us know what you thought of the show in the comments, we read them all!Don't forget to like and subscribe! New episodes with amazing guests coming every week.


Big thank you to our sponsors:

item.title: Episode 2: Marisa Merico (The Mafia Princess)
item.itunes:title: Episode 2: Marisa Merico (The Mafia Princess)
item.itunes:subtitle: Marisa Merico (The Mafia Princess)
item.description:
Welcome back to The Criminal Connection Podcast with your host, Terry Stone!


This week we have a very special guest, The Mafia Princess, Marisa Merico. Merisa is the daughter of one of Italy's most notorious Mafia Godfathers, Emilio DiGiovine.


She's not only an accomplished writer, journalist, and a captivating storyteller but also the daughter of one of Italy's most notorious Mafia Godfathers, Emilio DiGiovine. Prepare to embark on a journey through a life filled with intrigue, secrets, and the determination to break free from a legacy of crime.


Marisa Merico's life story is a gripping narrative of transformation and courage. Growing up in the shadow of organized crime, she faced unimaginable challenges and dilemmas. But rather than succumb to the dark allure of her family's criminal empire, Marisa chose a different pathone of truth, redemption, and self-discovery.

In this candid conversation, Marisa shares her personal journey of breaking away from the Mafia's grip, her relentless pursuit of justice, and her dedication to shedding light on the underworld's darkest secrets. Join us as we delve into the complexities of her family's legacy, the struggles she faced, and the profound impact it had on her life and choices.


Marisa Merico's story is a testament to the power of resilience, the strength of the human spirit, and the capacity for change. Her unwavering commitment to exposing the truth and seeking redemption makes this episode a must-listen for anyone fascinated by tales of redemption, true crime, and the triumph of the human spirit over adversity.

Whether you're a true crime enthusiast, an advocate for justice, or simply someone who values stories of transformation and resilience, this episode with Marisa Merico promises to be a captivating and thought-provoking experience. Tune in as we unravel the legacy, one story at a time, with our remarkable guest, Marisa Merico.


Don't forget to like and subscribe!


Big thank you to our sponsors:

Sure Pure: https://surepure.co.uk/

Stargaze Entertainments: https://www.stargazeentertainment.co.uk/

Dream Mentoring: https://dreammentoring.co.uk/

item.title: Episode 1: Bernard O'Mahoney (Essex Boys, Carlton Leach, Rise of the Foot Soldier & MORE!)
item.itunes:title: Episode 1: Bernard O'Mahoney (Essex Boys, Carlton Leach, Rise of the Foot Soldier & MORE!)
item.itunes:subtitle: Bernard O'Mahoney (Essex Boys, Carlton Leach, Rise of the Foot Soldier & MORE!)
item.description:
Welcome to the first ever episode of The Criminal Connection Podcast with your host, Terry Stone! This week we are joined by Bernard O'Mahoney for his first ever podcast appearance! Bernard shares stories from his childhood, his time in South Africa to how he ended up on the door at Raquel's nightclub in Basildon. Bernard reveals the details of his relationship with with The Krays, Tony Tucker, Pat Tate, Craig Rolfe and many more. In this episode Bernard shares his side of the story from Leah Betts's tragic death, the Essex Boys shootings, history with Carlton Leach and much more. Don't forget to like and subscribe! Big thank you to our sponsors: Sure Pure: https://surepure.co.uk/ Stargaze Entertainments: https://www.stargazeentertainment.co.uk/ Dream Mentoring: https://dreammentoring.co.uk/ Carson Kaye: https://www.carsonkaye.co.uk/
